Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Align clock marker tips at uniform edge circle

Fixed uneven marker appearance by adjusting translate distance per marker type.
Since markers have different heights, they need different translate values to 
align their tips \(outer ends\) at the same circle:

- Main markers \(10% height\): -400% translate
- Hour markers \(8% height\): -475% translate  
- Minute markers \(6% height\): -567% translate

This ensures all marker tips touch the same circular edge, creating a clean,
professional Swiss Railway clock appearance.
